Kaina kai palaia Things new and old, or, A store-house of similies, sentences, allegories, apophthegms, adagies, apologues, divine, morall, politicall, &c. : with their severall applications / collected and observed from the writings and sayings of the learned in all ages to this present by John Spencer ... Spencer, John, d. 1680. Fuller, Thomas, (1608-1661)
[14], 679, [35] p.
Printed by W. Wilson and J. Streater, for John Spencer ..., London : 1658.
"To the reader" signed: Tho. Fuller. Reproduction of original in Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England.
=======
